name: Mejbani Beef
description: Mejbani Beef tastes authentic chittagonian mejbani beef and provides all the same materials.It created with Beef and various kinds of elements mixed up over there and also some mixture of masalas made the whole dish mothwattering.

name: Beef Kalabhuna
description: Beef Kalabhuna tastes authentic chittagonian Kalabhuna and provides all the same materials which made by tradiationally in many occasion.It created with Beef and various kinds of elements mixed up over there and also some mixture of masalas made the whole dish mothwattering.

name: Nola Neheri
description: Nola Neheri is one of my special recipe. It created with Nola which came from cow and various kinds of elements mixed up over there and also some mixture of masalas made the whole dish mothwattering.

name: Chonar dail
description: Chonar Dail is one of my special recipe. It created with Chona and various kinds of elements mixed up over there and also some mixture of masalas made the whole dish mothwattering. It is kind of Juicy type.

name: Mutton Resala
description: Mutton Resala is one of my special recipe. It created with mutton and various kinds of elements mixed up over there and also some mixture of masalas made the whole dish mothwattering

name: Honey Chicken Salad
description: Honey Chicken Salad tastes really mothwatering. Prawns and various types of salads added over there. The mixture was tremendoulsly amazing. Also honey added to the salad which taste really good.
